Experience Corporate Technical Recruiter Enghouse Interactive August 2015  – Present (1 month) Irvine, CA Senior Recruiter - IBM Systems IBM April 2012  –  August 2015  (3 years 5 months) Research Triangle Park, NC / Anaheim, CA Served as subject matter expert on IBM recruitment regulations and overall hiring process for the Systems business unit. 
 
Maintained productive relationships with hiring managers throughout the entire requisition lifecycle to ensure that their hiring needs were fulfilled in a timely manner.  
 
Actively sourced and recruited for Storage Architects, Software Developers, Verification Engineers, and Storage Sales personnel. 
 
Continually monitored sourcing strategy and recommended changes to sourcing channels as needed to improve candidate flow. 
 
First line of contact for escalations and concerns that hiring managers may have with other recruitment coverage in the Systems business unit. IT Staffing Consultant Fidelity Investments March 2011  –  March 2012  (1 year 1 month) Durham, NC Provided technical staffing solutions for Fidelity’s Personal and Workplace Investing (PWI) division. Assigned requisitions ranged from associate to management level. 
 
Regularly recruited Project Managers, Software Developers (Java, .NET, Mainframe), Citrix Engineers, Systems Analysts, and Systems Administrators (Siebel and Windows). 
 
Processed internal and external applicants utilizing Taleo. 
 
Assisted management with constructing job descriptions and establishing recruitment strategies for their requisition(s). 
 
Reviewed resumes and pre-screened candidates via phone. 
 
Presented job offers to candidates and negotiated compensation. Technical Recruiter IBM October 2006  –  March 2011  (4 years 6 months) Senior recruiter for IBM’s well-publicized technology service delivery center hiring initiatives for start-up facilities in Columbia, MO and Dubuque, IA. 
 
Prepared and presented hiring metrics reports to management and HR directors.  
 
Lead focal for university recruitment on the Columbia, MO project.  
 
Primary point of contact for Missouri Division of Workforce Development and US military veteran placement agencies for hiring activity in Columbia.  
 
Recruited junior to senior level technical support personnel for the following areas: Middleware, Websphere, Oracle, MS Exchange, SharePoint, Blackberry, Tivoli, SAN Storage, and Mainframe.  
 
While abiding by OFCCP regulations, sourced, screened, and presented qualified candidates to IBM hiring managers.  
 
Mentored and trained new hires within the US Recruitment team on IBM hiring processes and the use of applicant tracking systems. Clinical Recruiter Atlantic Search Group June 2005  –  June 2006  (1 year 1 month) Full-cycle recruitment of clinical trials professionals for pharmaceutical and CRO clients. 
 
Professions of specialization: SAS Programming, Biostatistics, Clinical Data Management, and Drug Safety. 
 
Sourced new candidates through networking at career fairs, cold calling, internet job boards/ research, contact lists, internal databases, and employee referrals

Performed reference checks, salary negotiations, candidate preparation for interviews, and formulation of offer letters.  Experience Recruiter IBM Global Services May 2014  –  July 2015  (1 year 3 months) RTP, NC Recruiter for IBM Global Services: supporting Sidra Medical Research Center and Noor Bank. 
recruited for both a medical center and financial institution in the Middle East region.

Summary I love what I do.  
 
I am the Technical Group Employment Manager at BB&T – one of the country’s safest and soundest financial services institutions, frequently recognized as one of the 3 strongest banks in the country. I absolutely love my job because I get to: 
•	Manage a team of highly competent recruiters… we hunt and deliver technical talent for IT, our newly formed Enterprise Data Office, Digital Channel and other technical areas within the company 
•	See and act on the big picture. 
•	Drive results and in most cases, see the impact I make on my organization and my clients.  
•	Develop and keep relationships with key clients – over years – and truly be a partner.  
•	Implement my own ideas and help others implement theirs.  
•	Add value to a company I love working for.  
 
My long-time career goal (stated here for many months) has been to be an integral part of a world-class recruiting/retention/organizational development shop - to help build it, to help manage it, and to make it an example for other companies. I am living this and watching it play out every day. It’s a fantastic view.  
 
What could your view be like at BB&T? 
 
Specialties: I am naturally wired to see the big picture and question everything, am a passionate advocate for process improvements and data-driven business cases and find extreme satisfaction in building relationships. I particularly enjoy connecting people that don't realize they should be connected. 
 
IT, Banking, Life Sciences
